name: safe-clone-deep
description: Safely deep clone an object. Will not clone nested objects.

scripts.jshint: npm run jshint-src && npm run jshint-test
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run cover && npm run report && npm run check-cov || node scripts/tests-failed
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm publish && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin master && git push origin --tags

author: Michael J. Ryan <tracker1@gmail.com>
